savePlotJob

public static void savePlotJob(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
exports the currently loaded TypeTable into a file. The user will be asked for the destination.

Parameters:
dotplotCreator - link to get the TypeTable through the FMatrixController
shell - to be used as parent for the file selection dialog
